''Function''
__NOTOC__
=== Declaration ===
<tt>#include <pgm/pgm.h></tt>

<tt>struct [[2/OpenPGM_C_Reference/pgm_sk_buff_t|pgm_sk_buff_t]]* '''pgm_skb_copy''' (</tt><br>
: <tt>struct [[2/OpenPGM_C_Reference/pgm_sk_buff_t|pgm_sk_buff_t]] *skb</tt><br>
: <tt>);</tt>

=== Purpose ===
Create a copy of a skbuff.

=== Parameters ===

<table border="1" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<th>Parameter</th>
<th>Description</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><tt>skb</tt></td>
<td>PGM skbuff to copy.</td>
</tr>
</table>


=== Example ===
Create a new PGM skbuff, copy it and free the original.

 struct pgm_sk_buff_t *skb, *copy;
 skb = pgm_alloc_skb (1500);
 copy = pgm_skb_copy (skb);
 pgm_free_skb (skb);
